fields.fieldTitle: Overall Offer Title / Name: What's the overall Title / Name of your offer or what you're selling?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The Big title / name of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: ClickFunnels; Funnel Scripts; Copywriting Secrets; Funnel Hacker Mentor etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What's the Title / Name of this first part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What's the monetary Value of this first part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What does this first offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: research your niche audience super fast; learn to write great classified ads; create the ultimate speaker one-sheet; emergency fitness training routine, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get inside their minds quickly; generate tons of buyer leads this weekend; instantly set yourself apart from every other speaker they're considering; reach passing levels for your test in a month or less, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: reach even the most outrageous sales goals faster than you ever dreamed possible; sell your house and get on with your life; sell more from the back of the room and give your family the lifestyle they deserve; land the dream job you always wanted, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What's the Title / Name of this second part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What's the monetary Value of this second part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What does this second offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get off to a fast start with Instagram using hashtags; negotiate win-win contracts with nervous buyers; learn to creat the ultimate presentation to sell; know what to eat and drink before, during and after the fitness test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: generate targeted traffic quickly; avoid having a deal blow up in you face; make a ton of sales no matter how resistant the audience; instantly have the best energy levels for high performance, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: stop wasting money and time on traffic sources that don't work; get to closing in one piece; make every speech a potential gold mine; stand out as a top performer, especially at promotion time, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What's the Title / Name of this third part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What's the monetary Value of this third part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What does this third offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: instantly research all the hashtags for your niche on Instagram and Twitter; "Set the stage" for KILLER Showings to buyers; create order forms that sell "subconsciously"; learn the best way for your body to transition from one test to another, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: find all the most popular hashtags as well has hidden gem hashtags your competitors are missing; put up the best first impression every time; use your handouts to make more money; reach peak efficiency and maximize your score, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: literally save HUNDREDS of hours of research time you'll now be able to spend with your family instead; sell your house faster than the one down the street; enjoy the highest closing rate of any speaker; feel confident you'll ace any PT test... any time!, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: BONUS Piece #1: What's the Title / Name of this first part of your Bonus Offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: The Insiders Guide to Double Your Social Media Followers In 30 Days, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What's the monetary Value of this first Bonus Piece?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first Bonus Piece is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What does this first Bonus Piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build up your social media following fast; build a team of professionals to help you get your house sold; Learn 5 openers that instantly grab attention; specific ways to train smarter (not harder), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: reach a LOT more people with every post; have lawyers and bankers begging to help you; keep your audience's attention through the close; drop your mile pace, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make a lot more money and have a greater impact on the world; leverage the work of others to get your home sold; help a LOT more people sign up for your offers; avoid injuries that could derail your career, etc.

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."
